title: Board Of Naturopathic Medicine
cleaned_text: Board Of Naturopathic Medicine Naturopathic License Types - Naturopathic Physician Applicants and Licensees Information Application and Licensing Information Renewal Information (Renew by December 31 every odd-numbered year) (Renew by December 31 every odd-numbered year) - All Licenses regardless of issuance date, are subject to renewal by December 31 of every odd-numbered year. |On-time renewals for the licensing period of January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2025 | (Must renew by hardcopy only) |Renewals Accepted: November 6, 2023 to December |Renewal Hardcopy Form Mailout: November 3, 2023| |Renew By License Expiration Date: December 31, 2023| Licenses not renewed by license expiration date are unlicensed and may not practice. |On-Time Cost to Renew| |Naturopathic Physician (ND) - active status $528.00| |Naturopathic Physician (ND) - inactive status - $12.00| Restoration Information (Restore within 2 years after license expiration) (Restore within 2 years after license expiration) |Forfeited licenses may be restored within 2 years and subject to meeting restoration requirements. | (Must restore by hardcopy only) |Failure to restore a forfeited license within 2 years after the license expiration date will result in the termination of the license and the person must apply as a new applicant and meet current licensing requirements.| |Cost to Restore (late renewal)| |Naturopathic Physician (ND) status - $603.00| |Naturopathic Physician (ND) - inactive status - $87.00| Continuing Education Information CONTINUING EDUCATION ANNOUNCEMENTS CONTINUING EDUCATION INFORMATION
